headline: Data Entry Operator Executive Fresher Job (Part time/Remote)
summary: ISOCONIC is seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented data entry operator executive who is proficient in MS Excel to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for accurately inputting and managing large volumes of data to ensure the smooth operation of our business processes. If you have a passion for data accuracy and a strong understanding of Excel, we want to hear from you!

headline: Linux Techical Specialist Job (Remote)
summary: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Linux system administrator to join our team. As a Linux system administrator, you will be responsible for managing and maintaining our Linux-based systems and infrastructure, with particular expertise in Mail Server, DNS, and Ansible Automation. This role requires both technical specialism and broad knowledge of various server technologies. This is a probationary position with a duration of 6 months, after which salary may be increased based on performance.
